channel.title: How do i get people to join my server?(look at post)
channel.description: I made my server and i think i port-forwarded but anyway. I went in to my server with a no-ip address and it worked...but when i asked my friend to get on the server it didnt work for him i gave him the no-ip address and my ip address and it still doesnt work, why is this?what am i doing wrong?

item.title: How do i get people to join my server?(look at post)
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

make sure the server is running and you have port forwarded correctly

Read full topic
